text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Jury commissioner" means an individual who is designated under a jury plan to manage jury selection and service.
"Jury commissioner" includes an acting jury commissioner who is designated in accordance with a jury plan.

text.section: "Jury plan" means a plan that the circuit court for a county adopts under this title to govern jury selection and service for the county.
"Prospective juror" means an individual whose name is selected from a source pool but who has not yet been screened for disqualification, excusal, or exemption.
"Qualified juror" means an individual who, after selection as a prospective juror, is not disqualified, excused, or exempted.
"Source pool" means a pool from which the name of each prospective juror is to be selected as provided under a jury plan.
